title: Suggested VO lines for your favorite champions?
body:
I think the new VO for Lux is a good step in the right direction for giving small updates to the older champions. New champions come out with like 5-10 minutes of special interactive dialogue, while older champions are still stuck with 1-2 jokes and taunts. It gets stale after a while.

So, what are some champions you want to see get VOs, and what are some lines you'd like to hear them say?

For me, I'd like a {{champion:37}} VO.

Now, I know what you're thinking:

1.  She's a mute
2.  Her dialogue would be so boring because she doesn't say anything
3.  Fuck Sona, who cares?

I love Sona (obviously), and tbh her dialogue has always been lame. I love the idea that "Only you can hear me, Summoner"--even though Summoners don't exist anymore in the new lore, and thus this quote is dated. (A simple, "Only you can hear me" or a newer but similar quote would do). She's also an Ionia...that was adopted by a Demacian and raised in Demacia...who speaks Italian. Riot, please.

But I mean her in-game dialogue:
"A symphony of justice" (the Demacia quote)
"Accelerated movement, I concur" (Sona's response to the Summoner)
"Accurate, like a metronome" (Generic movement quote, about music)
"Adagio, Summoner" (response to the Summoner directly--should be changed for above mentioned reasons; music related, means "slow tempo")
"Brioso, brioso" (music related dialogue, "lively music" basically)
"Delicately" (Sona always says this when I'm going ham, so I always take it as her lecturing me lol....wow I have no life)
"From my mind to yours" (again, the connection between Sona and the player--which is good and unique to her)
"Harmoniously" (another one word response, music related again)
"Order through music" (music related)
"Quarter time" (music related)
"Shall we resolve this dissonance?" (Why yes, Sona, we shall. :) also, music related, dissonance = "tension", or lack of harmony)
"The fanfare ascends." (idle dialogue)
"With perfect tempo." (idle dialogue, music related)

And....that's it. Everything she says in her mind is related to music--which is fine, because she is constantly playing her etwahl. Her jokes are also understandable, as she can't tell a joke verbally to other champions (so she plays her etwahl like a guitar), and similarly is her taunt (where she plays her etwahl like a bad piano). Even her laugh is the sound of a harp...even though she has a laughing animation where she's not touching her etwahl at all.

The point is, I'd like to see some more dialogue for Sona that continues the theme of her talking to the player. "From my mind to yours....lemme tell you how I feel about this champion." Her taunts can be her own remarks about other champions that she tells the player; let her laugh in her head (which we have all done at some point); give the girl a music joke for all I care. 

Right now, her quotes are mainly just music references and one word responses. I know Sona has a personality in there, and she has her own thoughts and reactions. I don't think it would be out of place or wildly beyond her theme as a mute to be able to communicate those thoughts to the player.

But that's just me.

> [{quoted}](name=MavenSong,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=e3W00zkB,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-03-11T05:08:55.366+0000)
>
> Honestly her being Mute is core to her character. I highly doubt thats gunna go. If anything her VO will just be her thoughts about things and such.

It is, to some degree, but it's something that could be nixed and replaced with like extreme shyness or something and keep her pretty similar. As it stands now, with the removal of the Institute of  War and Summoners, there's really no way to explain how a mute will be speaking to you, the shop keepers, enemies she kills or attacks, or really anyone else without making her something like a telepath. The mute aspect of Sona is one of those very very limiting design aspects of her character that will artistically prevent her from having a fully actualized voice over without either breaking it or giving it some absurd explanation on why you can hear her speech.

Totally with you on the Sona thing. I'd love to hear her talk about more than just music.

Speaking of, how do you think the upcoming lore update will change Sona? I think it would be cool if she were a telekinetic empath of sorts who communicates solely through music, inspiring her audience without so much as uttering a word and feeling what they feel just by listening to the drum of their hearts. Not sure if that entails removing the more violent / fantasy aspects of her character such as her ability to physically destroy things through the magic of her etwahl, though I doubt Riot would do that simply because she needs an in-game reason to deal damage. 

For Quinn, I'd love if she had more lines in regards to her twin brother, Caleb. His death was a major driving factor in her life which led her to become a part of the Demacian elite. Something so simple as _"This is for you, Caleb"_ would be cool, perhaps as a quote that she says before entering combat. I'd also like some more interactions for her with other Demacian champs since we don't really get a clear picture of how she feels about or interacts with them. And of course, a few lines addressing Talon would be a huge help in understanding the nature of their rivalry.

I've already headcannon'd it that Sona is telepathic to some extent...because her in-game model elegantly glides around, she is never actually holding her etwahl in any way (not even a strap), and, of course, she communicates telepathically with the player. Perhaps there's limits to this telepathy, like she can only talk to one person at a time? I dunno.
